Text: I just created a user account with Pirate Bay to come and write this - I've been doing not much else except watching movies for around two weeks now, and I have to say this docu/movie whatever you want to call it, is the best piece of cinema I've seen in ages. The crisp, electric, unforgiving footage of front line action and absence of distracting commentary make this as close as you'll ever get to the front line without enlisting. Dennis is a genius. So is Froggy, amazing upload. Use VLC not Divx.
